# VEHICLE::GET_ENTRY_POINT_POSITION

## Summary
Returns the position of the specified entry point.

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex
* **INT** entryPointIndex:
Use GET_NUM_ENTRY_POINTS to get number of entry points.
Pass in any value between 0 and GET_NUM_ENTRY_POINTS.

## Returns
* **VECTOR**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
doorId: see SET_VEHICLE_DOOR_SHUT
